Wisdom: التَّوْبَةُ نَدَمٌ بِالْقَلْبِ وَاسْتِغْفَارٌ بِاللِّسَانِ وَتَرْكٌ بِالْجَوَارِحِ وَإِضْمَارُ أَنْ لَا يَعُودَ
enWisdom: Repentance is heartfelt regret, seeking forgiveness with the tongue, abandoning [the sin] with the limbs and a determination never to repeat it again

Wisdom: الذُّنُوبُ الدَّاءُ وَالدَّوَاءُ الِاسْتِغْفَارُ وَالشِّفَاءُ أَنْ لَا تَعُودَ
enWisdom: Vices are a disease, and its remedy is seeking forgiveness, and its cure is not repeating [the vices]
One who makes amends is on the brink of righteousness
Proper rectification [of one’s mistakes] is the symbol of righteousness

Wisdom: فَازَ مَنْ أَصْلَحَ عَمَلَ يَوْمِهِ وَاسْتَدْرَكَ فَوَارِطَ [فَوَائِتَ‏] أَمْسِهِ
enWisdom: Successful is the one who reforms his current actions and makes amends for his past mistakes

Wisdom: قَدْ أُمْهِلُوا فِي طَلَبِ الْمَخْرَجِ وَهُدُوا سَبِيلَ الْمَنْهَجِ
enWisdom: They have indeed been given time to seek deliverance and have been guided to the clear course

Wisdom: مَنْ أُعْطِيَ التَّوْبَةَ لَمْ يُحْرَمِ الْقَبُولَ
enWisdom: One who is granted repentance will not be deprived of its acceptance

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَقْبَلِ التَّوْبَةَ عَظُمَتْ خَطِيئَتُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever does not accept repentance, his sin is great
How devastating repentance is for the great crimes [one commits]!

Wisdom: مَا نَهَى اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عَنْ شَيْ‏ءٍ إِلَّا وَأَغْنَى عَنْهُ
enWisdom: Allah, the Glorified, does not forbid anything but that He has makes [the people] needless of it

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي الدُّنْيَا إِلَّا لِأَحَدِ رَجُلَيْنِ رَجُلٌ أَذْنَبَ ذُنُوباً فَهُوَ يَتَدَارَكُهَا بِالتَّوْبَةِ وَرَجُلٌ يُجَاهِدُ نَفْسَهُ عَلَى طَاعَةِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ
enWisdom: There is no good in this world except for two [types of] people: the person who makes amends for the sins that he commits, through repentance, and the person who struggles against his lower-self in obedience to Allah, the Glorified

Wisdom: نِعَمُ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ أَكْثَرُ مِنْ أَنْ تُشْكَرَ إِلَّا مَا أَعَانَ اللَّهُ عَلَيْهِ وَذُنُوبُ ابْنِ آدَمَ أَكْثَرُ مِنْ أَنْ تُغْفَرَ إِلَّا مَا عَفَا اللَّهُ عَنْهُ
enWisdom: The blessings of Allah, the Most High, are greater than can be appreciated, except with the help of Allah, and the sins of mankind are greater than can be forgiven, except what Allah pardons [out of His mercy]
